name: Kashmir Paradise
description: Experience the breathtaking valleys, Shikara rides, and snow-capped mountains of Kashmir.

name: Goa Beaches
description: Relax on golden beaches, enjoy vibrant nightlife, and explore water sports in Goa.

name: Rajasthan Royal Tour
description: Live like royalty with palace stays, desert safaris, and majestic forts in Rajasthan.

name: Kerala Backwaters
description: Cruise through tranquil backwaters and indulge in wellness and culture in Kerala.

name: Leh-Ladakh Adventure
description: Explore rugged terrains, high-altitude lakes, and thrilling bike rides in Ladakh.

name: Andaman Islands Escape
description: Dive into clear waters, explore coral reefs, and unwind on serene beaches.

name: Agra Heritage Tour
description: Step back in time with a visit to the iconic Taj Mahal and historic forts.

name: Meghalaya Nature Trail
description: Discover living root bridges, waterfalls, and pristine nature in Meghalaya.

name: Ooty Hill Escape
description: Wander through tea gardens, botanical wonders, and cool hill vibes in Ooty.

name: Varanasi Spiritual Journey
description: Witness the sacred Ganga Aarti and explore temples in India’s spiritual capital.

name: Coorg Coffee Trails
description: Breathe in the aroma of coffee plantations and soak in lush greenery in Coorg.

name: Hampi Heritage Tour
description: Explore ancient ruins, temples, and river-side serenity in Hampi.

name: Darjeeling Delight
description: Sip tea in the hills, enjoy toy train rides, and view snowy peaks in Darjeeling.

name: Sikkim Serenity
description: Explore scenic lakes, peaceful monasteries, and Himalayan vistas in Sikkim.

name: Manali Snow Adventure
description: Hit the slopes, visit Solang Valley, and enjoy snow-filled fun in Manali.

name: Shimla Getaway
description: Wander through colonial streets and pine forests in this charming hill town.

name: Udaipur Romantic Escape
description: Sail across serene lakes and explore royal palaces in the city of lakes.

name: Mysore Heritage Walk
description: Discover regal history, markets, and grand architecture in Mysore.

name: Madurai Temple Tour
description: Marvel at Dravidian architecture and spiritual sites in Madurai.

name: Tirupati Pilgrimage
description: Seek blessings at one of India's most sacred pilgrimage destinations.

name: Pondicherry French Escape
description: Experience colonial charm, calm beaches, and spiritual vibes in Pondicherry.

name: Mumbai City Life
description: Feel the energy of India’s financial capital, full of culture and coastline.

name: Delhi Historical Tour
description: Visit historic forts, mosques, and buzzing markets in India's capital city.

name: Rishikesh Yoga Retreat
description: Relax with yoga by the Ganges and adventure through rafting in Rishikesh.

name: Haridwar Spiritual Tour
description: Explore ancient temples and witness the divine Ganga Aarti at Haridwar.

name: Kanyakumari Sunset Tour
description: Witness the union of seas and stunning sunsets in Kanyakumari.

name: Munnar Green Hills
description: Roam lush hills and tea gardens in the scenic paradise of Munnar.

name: Alleppey Houseboat Bliss
description: Enjoy houseboat cruises and peaceful waters in Alleppey’s backwaters.

name: Chikmagalur Coffee Tour
description: Wake up to misty mornings and fresh brews in Chikmagalur's hills.

name: Bangalore Tech City Tour
description: Explore the Silicon Valley of India with parks, palaces, and tech hubs.

name: Hyderabad Nizam Tour
description: Discover the legacy of the Nizams and taste iconic Hyderabadi biryani.

name: Kolkata Culture Trip
description: Enjoy colonial charm, literary history, and street food in Kolkata.

name: Amritsar Golden Tour
description: Visit the Golden Temple and experience the patriotic Wagah ceremony.

name: Chennai Cultural Circuit
description: Walk the Marina Beach and explore rich temple traditions in Chennai.

name: Bikaner Desert Safari
description: Ride camels, enjoy folk shows, and camp under desert skies in Bikaner.

name: Mount Abu Retreat
description: Escape to the cool hills and tranquil lakes of Rajasthan’s only hill station.

name: Mahabalipuram Heritage
description: Explore rock-cut temples and coastal beauty in Mahabalipuram.

name: Aurangabad Caves & Forts
description: Discover ancient art in the Ajanta & Ellora caves and historic forts.

name: Konark Sun Temple Tour
description: Visit the magnificent Sun Temple and nearby beach landscapes.

name: Sundarbans Wildlife Safari
description: Cruise the mangroves in search of Royal Bengal tigers and exotic birds.

name: Ranthambore Tiger Safari
description: Embark on thrilling safaris to spot tigers in Ranthambore National Park.

name: Jim Corbett Wild Adventure
description: Explore forests, spot wildlife, and enjoy nature at Jim Corbett.

name: Khajuraho Temple Tour
description: Marvel at intricate temple carvings and attend cultural shows.

name: Nainital Lake Retreat
description: Sail on shimmering lakes and stroll through pine-scented streets.

name: Daman & Diu Island Escape
description: Experience calm island vibes, clean beaches, and water fun.
